016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.eventstore.resources;
017
018import com.eventstore.dbclient.StreamNotFoundException;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.Attributes;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.ResourceDocument;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.ResourceObject;
022import jakarta.inject.Inject;
023import jakarta.inject.Provider;
024import jakarta.ws.rs.*;
025
026import java.util.Optional;
027import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
028import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
029
030import static jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response.Status.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR;
031
032@Path("api/eventstore/streams/{id}")
033public class StreamResource {
034
035    private final EventStoreStreams eventStoreService;
036
037    @Inject
038    public StreamResource(Provider<EventStoreStreams> eventStoreService) {
039        this.eventStoreService = Optional.ofNullable(eventStoreService.get()).orElseThrow(NotFoundException::new);
040    }
041
042    @GET
043    public CompletionStage<ResourceDocument> get(@PathParam("id") String id) {
044        return eventStoreService.getStream(id)
045                .thenApply(streamModel ->
046                        new ResourceDocument.Builder()
047                                .data(new ResourceObject.Builder("Stream", streamModel.id())
048                                        .attributes(new Attributes.Builder()
049                                                .attribute("revision", streamModel.revision())))
050                                .build()).exceptionallyCompose(throwable ->
051                {
052                    if (throwable.getCause() instanceof StreamNotFoundException) {
053                        return CompletableFuture.failedStage(new NotFoundException());
054                    } else {
055                        return CompletableFuture.failedStage(new ServerErrorException(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR, throwable.getCause()));
056                    }
057                });
058    }
059}
